query.description: Submission from date time in the format, 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss', maximum date from/to date range is 30 days. If neither from/to date is provided returns results for the last 30 days.
Submission to date time in the format, 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss', maximum date from/to date range is 30 days. If neither from/to date is provided returns results for the last 30 days.
A number of statuses can be queried within a single request by providing multiple occurences of the parameter. If not provided all statuses will be returned
Payer name. This parameter supports searching with wildcards
Payer e-mail. This parameter supports searching with wildcards

Payment reference will attempt to match endToEndIdentification, remittanceInformation.reference and remittanceInformation.unstructured. Will return all matches and partial matches if using wildcard searches. This parameter supports searching with wildcards

header.description: Number in seconds to wait

response.name: OK
